title: Genetic differences of Vibrio bacteria strains 2

content.question: Using the information presented in the graph, describe the relationship between antagonism and genetic relatedness in the communities of Vibrio bacteria sampled for the study.

frqParts.text: Using the information presented in the graph, describe the relationship between antagonism and genetic relatedness in the communities of Vibrio bacteria sampled for the study.

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
